name: Character Development
description:
You are locked in an endless log battle against BossMan. You wield yous like a sword, while he throws his like spears. For every victory you gain against him, you feel slightly stronger. However BossMan grows even stronger for every loss he's suffered.  Will you be able to find an end in this loop before BossMan finally defeats you?

Controls

WASD to move

Left Click to attack

In browser

Double tap escape twice exit the game and gain back control of your mouse. Refresh the page if you want to play the game still.

In application

Single tap escape to quit game

Known Problems:

  • UI is not formatting correctly
  • Animations can be janky at times
